faq.title: FAQ
faq.a1: No. It’s your digital storefront: showcase properties, analyze client interests, and manage listings.
faq.a2: The basic plan is completely free. Pro features are available with a subscription.
faq.a3: Verify your license, and your profile is ready in 5 minutes. Importing properties takes another 10–15 minutes. You can start working with clients right away.
